description:
The following error occured when I try the latest version.

2011-04-11 14:05:46,223 AUDIT nova.compute.manager [2C73DQY-VVUMN9HX6LNW anne IRT] instance 2: starting...
2011-04-11 14:05:46,322 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous call on network.ubuntu6 ... from (pid=12781) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:350
2011-04-11 14:05:46,323 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] MSG_ID is 65648aaddab34beca00e643c92fa46b9 from (pid=12781) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:353
2011-04-11 14:05:46,570 ERROR nova [-] Exception during message handling
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive
(nova): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 120, in _wrap
(nova): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 222, in run_instance
(nova): TRACE:     "vpn": is_vpn}})
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 385, in call
(nova): TRACE:     raise wait_msg.result
(nova): TRACE: RemoteError: OperationalError (OperationalError) (1054, "Unknown column 'instances.instance_type' in 'field list'")

The version I used is 2011.2~bzr972-0ubuntu0ppa1~maverick1. And FYI I pasted the content of nova.conf below.

--sql_connection=mysql://root:nova@ubuntu7/nova
--s3_host=ubuntu7
--rabbit_host=192.168.32.207
--cc_host=192.168.32.207
--ec2_url=http://192.168.32.207:8773/services/Cloud

--daemonize=1

--dhcpbridge_flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
--dhcpbridge=/usr/bin/nova-dhcpbridge

--FAKE_subdomain=ec2

--ca_path=/var/lib/nova/CA
--keys_path=/var/lib/nova/keys
--networks_path=/var/lib/nova/networks
--instances_path=/var/lib/nova/instances
--images_path=/var/lib/nova/images
--buckets_path=/var/lib/nova/buckets

--libvirt_type=kvm

--network_manager=nova.network.manager.VlanManager

--vlan_interface=eth0

--logdir=/var/log/nova
--verbose
--volume_group=ubuntu7
--fixed_range=10.0.0.0/8
--network_size=5000
--lock_path=/var/lib/nova/tmp
--flat_interface=eth0
title: RemoteError: OperationalError (OperationalError) (1054, 'Unknown column 'instances.instance_type' in 'field list'')

comments.content:
The following error occured when I try the latest version.

2011-04-11 14:05:46,223 AUDIT nova.compute.manager [2C73DQY-VVUMN9HX6LNW anne IRT] instance 2: starting...
2011-04-11 14:05:46,322 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous call on network.ubuntu6 ... from (pid=12781) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:350
2011-04-11 14:05:46,323 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] MSG_ID is 65648aaddab34beca00e643c92fa46b9 from (pid=12781) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:353
2011-04-11 14:05:46,570 ERROR nova [-] Exception during message handling
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive
(nova): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 120, in _wrap
(nova): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 222, in run_instance
(nova): TRACE:     "vpn": is_vpn}})
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 385, in call
(nova): TRACE:     raise wait_msg.result
(nova): TRACE: RemoteError: OperationalError (OperationalError) (1054, "Unknown column 'instances.instance_type' in 'field list'")

The version I used is 2011.2~bzr972-0ubuntu0ppa1~maverick1. And FYI I pasted the content of nova.conf below.

--sql_connection=mysql://root:nova@ubuntu7/nova
--s3_host=ubuntu7
--rabbit_host=192.168.32.207
--cc_host=192.168.32.207
--ec2_url=http://192.168.32.207:8773/services/Cloud

--daemonize=1

--dhcpbridge_flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
--dhcpbridge=/usr/bin/nova-dhcpbridge

--FAKE_subdomain=ec2

--ca_path=/var/lib/nova/CA
--keys_path=/var/lib/nova/keys
--networks_path=/var/lib/nova/networks
--instances_path=/var/lib/nova/instances
--images_path=/var/lib/nova/images
--buckets_path=/var/lib/nova/buckets

--libvirt_type=kvm

--network_manager=nova.network.manager.VlanManager

--vlan_interface=eth0

--logdir=/var/log/nova
--verbose
--volume_group=ubuntu7
--fixed_range=10.0.0.0/8
--network_size=5000
--lock_path=/var/lib/nova/tmp
--flat_interface=eth0
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~guanxiaohua2k6

comments.content:
guan --

did you do a '$ nova-manage db sync' after updating to the most recent version of the software? 

bzr revno 955 added a database migration that altered instance_types table and added a foreign key to the instances table.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ken-pepple

comments.content:
I tried again. Now the error disappeared. 

Thank you, Ken.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~guanxiaohua2k6
